name: The golden girl pulls and licks the dog
name_original: The golden girl pulls and licks the dog
description:
A magical girl is suddenly teleported to an ancient enchanted forest filled with licking dogs. The magic maiden can only use magic to pull them in order not to be licked.This is a female character as the main body of the magic shooting game. There are 3 scenarios, each with 3 levels of difficulty (easy, normal, hard). After entering the game, beat 20 waves of 36 dogs per wave. After all of them are defeated, a new 36 dogs will be refreshed. Beat the current difficulty after beating 20 waves.

Game Features:
⚪ 3D mowing, special effects cool.
⚪ Multi-language, switch at will.
⚪ Upgrade your skills for unlimited power.

Game operation:
⚪ WSAD moves.
⚪ mouse motion vision.
⚪ Fully automated attack.
